sentences: Ta on töötanud selles ettevõttes aastate viimased.
Meie suur peremees elab aastate tagasi.
Kõik need muutused on toimunud aastate jooksul.
context: The word 'aastate' is the Estonian genitive plural form of the word 'aasta', meaning 'year'. In this case, it indicates possession or relationship with multiple years. It can be translated as 'of years' or used to express duration like 'for years'. This form often follows possessive pronouns or appears in expressions indicating time periods.
